ticket_details.description:
1. URL Field
2. Have an area for raw text
3. Have a “load from JIRA” button
4. Have a button to Generate test plan 
5. Have a button to generate RTM
6. Have multiple tabs for ticket, rtm, requirement,...

1. Enable exporting the generated test plan for documentation or audits.
Acceptance Criteria
1.  “Download JSON” button
2. “Download PDF” button
3. PDF mirrors UI layout
Technical Notes
1. Use backend...
